title-part.text: INDEXING SCHEME ASSOCIATED WITH SUBCLASS B29C, RELATING TO PARTICULAR ARTICLES

note.note-paragraph:
This subclass constitutes an indexing scheme for non-obligatory use only. The indexing scheme may be used to identify information which supplements subject matter already classified in subclass B29C. The indexing codes of this subclass, of which only the pertinent ones should be selected, are added in conformity with paragraph 82 of the Guide so as to provide information concerning the articles produced
This subclass constitutes an indexing scheme associated with subclass B29C [N: and group B29B17/00. Parts of specified articles are indexed with the same index codes as the articles]

title-part.text: Flat articles, e.g. films or sheets

CPC-specific-text.text: Narrow strips, e.g. ribbons, tapes, bands

reference.text: belts B29L29/00; tapes as carrier of sound or information B29L2017/008

title-part.text: Gear wheels or similar articles with grooves or projections, e.g. control knobs

CPC-specific-text.text: Carriers of records containing fine grooves or impressions, e.g. disc records for needle playback, cylinder records

title-part.text: Buttons or semi-finished parts of buttons
Hair combs or similar toothed or slotted articles

reference.text: tubular articles B29L23/00; pneumatic tyres B29L30/00

CPC-specific-text.text: having dividing walls, e.g. additional elements placed between object parts

reference.text: for use as pipe couplings B29L31/24

title-part.text: Flexible squeeze tubes, e.g. for cosmetics

reference.text: bent tubes not for use as pipe couplings B29L2023/004

title-part.text: Endless tubes, e.g. inner tubes for pneumatic tyres

reference.text: conveyor belts B29L2031/7092; drive belts B29L2031/7094; fourdrinier belts B29L2031/733

title-part.text: Pneumatic or solid tyres or parts thereof

reference.text: conveyor belts B29L2031/7092; drive belts B29L2031/7094; fourdrinier belts B29L2031/733

note.note-paragraph: Groups B29L2031/70 - B29L2031/7782 do not correspond to former or current IPC groups. Concordance CPC : IPC for these groups is as follows: B29L2031/70 - B29L2031/7782: B29L31/00

CPC-specific-text.text: and provided with a sealing element

reference.text: shafts B29L2031/75; poles, masts, posts B29L2031/766

title-part.text: Blades for rotors, stators, fans, turbines or the like, e.g. screw propellers
Building elements, e.g. bricks, blocks, tiles, panels, posts, beams

reference.text: optical filters B29L2011/0066, sieves or screens B29L2031/737

title-part.text: Frictional elements, e.g. brake or clutch linings
Sealing devices, e.g. packaging for pistons or pipe joints
Vehicles, e.g. ships or aircraft, or body parts thereof

reference.text: vanes or blades B29L31/08, air bags B29L2022/027

CPC-specific-text.text: Superstructures characterized by combining metal and plastics, i.e. hybrid parts

title-part.text: Wheels, pinions, pulleys, castors or rollers,

reference.text: inner tubes B29L2023/245; gears B29L2015/003; tyres B29L30/00

CPC-specific-text.text: Rollers or cylinders having an axial length of several times the diameter, e.g. embossing, pressing or printing

title-part.text: Electrical apparatus, e.g. sparking plugs or parts thereof

CPC-specific-text.text: Accessories for radios, record players or the like

reference.text: B29L2031/3406 to B29L2031/3443 take precedence, cabinets B29L2031/445

CPC-specific-text.text: Housings or casings incorporating or embedding electric or electronic elements
Moulded interconnect devices, i.e. moulded articles provided with integrated circuit traces

reference.text: buttons for haberdashery B29L19/00, press-buttons as fastening element B29L2031/7282
handgrips as part of the body finishing of the vehicles B29L2031/3029

title-part.text: Footwear, e.g. shoes or parts thereof
Stoppers or lids for bottles, jars, or the like
Upholstery or cushions, e.g. vehicle upholstery or interior padding
Multitubular or multicompartmented articles, e.g. honeycomb

CPC-specific-text.text: Multi-tubular articles, i.e. composed of a plurality of tubes
composed of several elementary tubular elements
one placed inside the other, e.g. dual wall tubes
one placed inside the other, e.g. dual wall tubes
Cables, i.e. two or more filaments combined together, e.g. ropes, cords, strings, yarns

reference.text: filamentary material B29L2031/731, electric cables B29L2031/3462, optical cables B29L2011/0075

CPC-specific-text.text: Articles shaped in a closed loop, e.g. conveyor belts
Containers; Packaging elements or accessories, Packages

reference.text: closures therefor B29L31/56; ink or toner cartridges B29L2031/7678; squeeze tubes B29L23/20; suitcases B29L2031/7418
tea bags B29L2031/7122; medical bags B29L2031/7148

CPC-specific-text.text: of the wide mouth type, i.e. the diameters of the bottle opening and its body are substantially identical

Cartons of the fruit juice or milk type, i.e. containers of polygonal cross sections formed by folding blanks into a tubular body with end-closing or contents-supporting elements, e.g. gable type containers
Cosmetic equipment, e.g. hair dressing, shaving equipment

reference.text: sawing equipment B29L2031/77; grinding equipment B29L2031/736

CPC-specific-text.text: Vibration dampening equipment, e.g. shock absorbers

reference.text: bolts B29L2001/002; nuts B29L2001/005; screws B29L2001/007; slide fasteners B29L5/00; buttons for haberdashery B29L19/00
B29L2031/7274 takes precedence; for pipes or tubes B29L31/24; electrical B29L31/34

CPC-specific-text.text: Filamentary material, i.e. comprised of a single element, e.g. filaments, strands, threads, fibres

reference.text: piles carpets B29L2031/7652; for vehicles B29L2031/3017

CPC-specific-text.text: Articles provided with holes, e.g. grids, sieves
Machines or parts thereof not otherwise provided for

reference.text: conveyor belts B29L2031/7092; driving belts B29L2031/7094; bearings B29L31/04

CPC-specific-text.text: Supports, machine frames or beds, worktables

reference.text: bloodbags, medical bags B29L2031/7148; artificial eyes B29L2011/0008

CPC-specific-text.text: Articles provided with piles, e g. nap on cloth
Articles characterised by their shape and not otherwise provided for

reference.text: closed loop B29L2031/709; ring-like B29L2031/7096; corrugated B29L16/00, flat B29L7/00; hollow B29L22/00; screw-threaded B29L1/00; toothed B29L2031/775; corrugated tubes B29L23/18

CPC-specific-text.text: Diabolo-shaped, i.e. formed by two cones joined at their peaks

reference.text: corrugated B29L16/00; screw-threaded B29L1/00; corrugated tubes B29L23/18; comb-like B29L21/00; gears, pinions, sprocket-wheels B29L15/00
profiled elements for making window frames B29L2031/005, windscreens B29L2031/3052
